data.name: NewSiteMailBodyFormat
data.value:
Dear {0}!
You have been granted access to an additional plant '{1}' in the Climatix IC. Role names: {2}.
You can access it at {3}
If you have any questions, please consult your Climatix IC system administrator.
Kind regards, Climatix IC remote servicing

data.name: ResetPasswordMailBodyFormat
data.value:
Dear {0}!
You have requested a password reset for the Climatix IC. To reset your password, please follow this link:
{1}
It will only be valid for the next {2} minutes. After this period, you will have to re-request the password reset.
If you have not requested this password reset, simply ignore this mail. Your password will remain the same as before.
Kind regards, Climatix IC remote servicing

data.name: WebApiResetPasswordMailBodyFormat

Kind regards, Climatix IC remote servicing
